scenario: I'm relocating to New York City next month and need to find a 3 bedroom condo with 2 bathrooms in the $1500- $2500 range. While arranging the move, I also want to browse Marriott Bonvoy credit cards to pick one for short-term hotel stays and to earn points.
combined_task: Find 3-bedroom, 2-bath condos in NYC within the $1500- $2500 range and evaluate Marriott Bonvoy credit card options to support short-term stays and earn loyalty points during the move.
selected_subtasks: Browse Marriott Bonvoy credit cards on Marriott.
Search for 3 bedroom condos with 2 bathrooms within $1500- $2500 range in NYC.
